IPA Fonts are JIS X 0213:2004 compliant TrueType based OpenType format outline fonts.
In using IPA fonts, please comply with the terms and conditions set out in "IPA Font License Agreement v1.0" included in this package. Any use, reproduction or distribution of the IPA Font or any exercise of rights under "IPA Font License Agreement v1.0" by a Recipient constitutes the Recipient's acceptance of the License Agreement.
